00015 @implementation NSMutableArray(Queue)
00016 - (id)popObject
00017 {
00018     id object=nil;
00019     if ([self count])
00020     {
00021         object=[self objectAtIndex:0];
00022         [object retain];
00023         [self removeObjectAtIndex:0];
00024     }
00025     return [object autorelease];
00026 }
00027 
00028 - (void)pushObject:(id)object
00029 {
00030     [self addObject:object];
00031 }
00032 
00033 @end

00043 - (UInt8)doReturn
00044 {
00045     if ( checkStatus )
00046         return kNXTRet;
00047     return kNXTNoRet;
00048 }
00049 
00050 - (void)dumpMessage:(const void*)message length:(int)length prefix:(NSString*)prefix
00051 {
00052     NSString *hexMessage = [NSString string];
00053     int i;
00054     for (i = 0; i < length; i++)
00055         hexMessage = [hexMessage stringByAppendingString:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%.2p, ", *((unsigned char *)message+i)]];
00056     NSLog(@"%@%@", prefix, hexMessage);
00057 }
00058 
00059 - (void)dumpMessage:(NSData*)message prefix:(NSString*)prefix
00060 {
00061     [self dumpMessage:[message bytes] length:[message length] prefix:prefix];
00062 }
00063 
00064 - (void)sendMessage:(void*)message length:(UInt8)length
00065 {
00066     char fullMessage[66]; // maximum message size (64) + size (2)
00067     
00068     fullMessage[0] = length;
00069     fullMessage[1] = 0;
00070     memcpy(fullMessage+2, message, length);
00071     
00072     
00073     [self dumpMessage:fullMessage length:length+2 prefix:@"-> "];
00074     [mRFCOMMChannel writeSync:fullMessage length:length+2];
00075 }

00090     [self LSGetStatus:port];

00109 - (void)checkSensorPort:(UInt8)port
00110 {
00111     if ( port > kNXTSensor4 )
00112         NSLog(@"pollSensor: unknown sensor port %d", port);
00113 }
00114 
00115 - (void)invalidateSensorTimer:(UInt8)port
00116 {
00117     if ( sensorTimers[port] != nil )
00118     {
00119         [sensorTimers[port] invalidate];
00120         sensorTimers[port] = nil;
00121     }
00122 }

00124 - (void)pushLsGetStatusQueue:(UInt8)port
00125 {
00126     [lsGetStatusLock lock];
00127     [lsGetStatusQueue pushObject:[NSNumber numberWithUnsignedShort:port]];
00128     [lsGetStatusLock unlock];
00129 }
00130 
00131 - (UInt8)popLsGetStatusQueue
00132 {
00133     [lsGetStatusLock lock];
00134     id object = [lsGetStatusQueue popObject];
00135     [lsGetStatusLock unlock];
00136     return [object unsignedShortValue];
00137 }
00138 
00139 - (void)pushLsReadQueue:(UInt8)port
00140 {
00141     [lsReadLock lock];
00142     [lsReadQueue pushObject:[NSNumber numberWithUnsignedShort:port]];
00143     [lsReadLock unlock];
00144 }
00145 
00146 - (UInt8)popLsReadQueue
00147 {
00148     [lsReadLock lock];
00149     id object = [lsReadQueue popObject];
00150     [lsReadLock unlock];
00151     return [object unsignedShortValue];
00152 }

00158 // constructor //
00160 
00161 - (id)init
00162 {    
00163     int i;
00164     
00165     connected = NO;
00166     checkStatus = NO;
00167     
00168     for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
00169         sensorTimers[i] = nil;
00170     
00171     lsGetStatusQueue = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00172     lsReadQueue = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00173     
00174     lsGetStatusLock = [NSLock new];
00175     lsReadLock = [NSLock new];
00176         
00177     return self;
00178 }

00185 // bluetooth connection delegates //
00187 
00188 - (void)close:(IOBluetoothDevice*)device
00189 {
00190     int port;
00191     
00192     connected = NO;
00193     
00194     for ( port = 0; port < 4; port++ )
00195         [self invalidateSensorTimer:port];                      
00196                         
00197     if ( mBluetoothDevice == device )
00198     {
00199         IOReturn error = [mBluetoothDevice closeConnection];
00200         if ( error != kIOReturnSuccess )
00201         {
00202             NSLog(@"Error - failed to close the device connection with error %08lx.\n", (UInt32)error);
00203             if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTCommunicationError:code:)])
00204                 [_delegate NXTCommunicationError:self code:error];
00205         }
00206     
00207         [mBluetoothDevice release];
00208     }
00209 }
00210 
00211 // from NXTMailController
00212 - (BOOL)connect:(id)delegate
00213 {
00214     IOBluetoothDeviceSelectorController *deviceSelector;
00215         IOBluetoothSDPUUID                                      *sppServiceUUID;
00216         NSArray                                                         *deviceArray;
00217 
00218     NSLog( @"Attempting to connect" );
00219     [self setDelegate:delegate];
00220         
00221     // The device selector will provide UI to the end user to find a remote device
00222     deviceSelector = [IOBluetoothDeviceSelectorController deviceSelector];
00223         
00224         if ( deviceSelector == nil ) {
00225                 NSLog( @"Error - unable to allocate IOBluetoothDeviceSelectorController.\n" );
00226                 return FALSE;
00227         }
00228         sppServiceUUID = [IOBluetoothSDPUUID uuid16:kBluetoothSDPUUID16ServiceClassSerialPort];
00229         [deviceSelector addAllowedUUID:sppServiceUUID];
00230         if ( [deviceSelector runModal] != kIOBluetoothUISuccess ) {
00231                 NSLog( @"User has cancelled the device selection.\n" );
00232                 return FALSE;
00233         }       
00234         deviceArray = [deviceSelector getResults];      
00235         if ( ( deviceArray == nil ) || ( [deviceArray count] == 0 ) ) {
00236                 NSLog( @"Error - no selected device.  ***This should never happen.***\n" );
00237                 return FALSE;
00238         }
00239         IOBluetoothDevice *device = [deviceArray objectAtIndex:0];
00240         IOBluetoothSDPServiceRecord     *sppServiceRecord = [device getServiceRecordForUUID:sppServiceUUID];
00241         if ( sppServiceRecord == nil ) {
00242                 NSLog( @"Error - no spp service in selected device.  ***This should never happen since the selector forces the user to select only devices with spp.***\n" );
00243                 return FALSE;
00244         }
00245         // To connect we need a device to connect and an RFCOMM channel ID to open on the device:
00246         UInt8   rfcommChannelID;
00247         if ( [sppServiceRecord getRFCOMMChannelID:&rfcommChannelID] != kIOReturnSuccess ) {
00248                 NSLog( @"Error - no spp service in selected device.  ***This should never happen an spp service must have an rfcomm channel id.***\n" );
00249                 return FALSE;
00250         }
00251         
00252         // Open asyncronously the rfcomm channel when all the open sequence is completed my implementation of "rfcommChannelOpenComplete:" will be called.
00253         if ( ( [device openRFCOMMChannelAsync:&mRFCOMMChannel withChannelID:rfcommChannelID delegate:self] != kIOReturnSuccess ) && ( mRFCOMMChannel != nil ) ) {
00254                 // Something went bad (looking at the error codes I can also say what, but for the moment let's not dwell on
00255                 // those details). If the device connection is left open close it and return an error:
00256                 NSLog( @"Error - open sequence failed.***\n" );
00257                 [self close:device];
00258                 return FALSE;
00259         }
00260         
00261         mBluetoothDevice = device;
00262         [mBluetoothDevice  retain];
00263         [mRFCOMMChannel retain];
00264         return TRUE;
00265 }
00266

00272 
00273 - (void)rfcommChannelClosed:(IOBluetoothRFCOMMChannel *)rfcommChannel
00274 {
00275         [self performSelector:@selector(close:) withObject:mBluetoothDevice afterDelay:1.0];
00276     [self stopAllTimers];
00277     [_delegate NXTClosed:self];
00278 }
00279 
00280 - (void)rfcommChannelOpenComplete:(IOBluetoothRFCOMMChannel*)rfcommChannel status:(IOReturn)error
00281 {
00282     connected = YES;
00283     
00284     [_delegate NXTDiscovered:self];
00285     
00286         if ( error != kIOReturnSuccess ) {
00287                 NSLog(@"Error - failed to open the RFCOMM channel with error %08lx.\n", (UInt32)error);
00288         if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTCommunicationError:code:)])
00289             [_delegate NXTCommunicationError:self code:error];
00290                 [self rfcommChannelClosed:rfcommChannel];
00291                 return;
00292         }
00293     
00294         
00295 }
00296 
00297 - (void)rfcommChannelData:(IOBluetoothRFCOMMChannel*)rfcommChannel data:(void *)dataPointer length:(size_t)dataLength
00298 {
00299     int i = 0;
00300     
00301     [self dumpMessage:dataPointer length:dataLength prefix:@"<- "];
00302     
00303     while ( i < dataLength )
00304     {
00305         UInt16 messageLength = 0;
00306         UInt8  opCode = 0;
00307         UInt8 status = 0;
00308         
00309         // get the command length
00310         memcpy(&messageLength, dataPointer+i, 2);
00311         messageLength = OSSwapLittleToHostInt16(messageLength);
00312         i += 2;
00313         
00314         // read the opcode and status
00315         memcpy(&opCode, dataPointer+i+1, 1);
00316         memcpy(&status, dataPointer+i+2, 1);
00317         i += 3;
00318                 
00319                 
00320         
00321         // report error status
00322         if ( status != kNXTSuccess && [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTOperationError:operation:status:)] )
00323             [_delegate NXTOperationError:self operation:opCode status:status];
00324         else
00325         {
00326                         
00327                         
00328                         
00329                         
00330             if ( opCode == kNXTGetOutputState )
00331             {
00332                 UInt8 port;
00333                 SInt8 power;
00334                 UInt8 mode;
00335                 UInt8 regulationMode;
00336                 SInt8 turnRatio;
00337                 UInt8 runState;
00338                 UInt32 tachoLimit;
00339                 SInt32 tachoCount;
00340                 SInt32 blockTachoCount;
00341                 SInt32 rotationCount;
00342                 
00343                 memcpy(&port,            dataPointer+i+0,  1); // 3
00344                 memcpy(&power,           dataPointer+i+1,  1); // 4
00345                 memcpy(&mode,            dataPointer+i+2,  1); // 5
00346                 memcpy(&regulationMode,  dataPointer+i+3,  1); // 6
00347                 memcpy(&turnRatio,       dataPointer+i+4,  1); // 7
00348                 memcpy(&runState,        dataPointer+i+5,  1); // 8
00349                 memcpy(&tachoLimit,      dataPointer+i+6,  4); // 9
00350                 memcpy(&tachoCount,      dataPointer+i+10, 4); // 13
00351                 memcpy(&blockTachoCount, dataPointer+i+14, 4); // 17
00352                 memcpy(&rotationCount,   dataPointer+i+18, 4); // 21
00353                 i += 21;
00354                 
00355                 tachoLimit      = OSSwapLittleToHostInt32(tachoLimit);
00356                 tachoCount      = OSSwapLittleToHostInt32(tachoCount);
00357                 blockTachoCount = OSSwapLittleToHostInt32(blockTachoCount);
00358                 rotationCount   = OSSwapLittleToHostInt32(rotationCount);
00359                 
00360                 if ( [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTGetOutputState:port:power:mode:regulationMode:turnRatio:runState:tachoLimit:tachoCount:blockTachoCount:rotationCount:)] )
00361                     [_delegate NXTGetOutputState:self
00362                                             port:port
00363                                            power:power
00364                                             mode:mode
00365                                   regulationMode:regulationMode
00366                                        turnRatio:turnRatio
00367                                         runState:runState
00368                                       tachoLimit:tachoLimit
00369                                       tachoCount:tachoCount
00370                                  blockTachoCount:blockTachoCount
00371                                    rotationCount:rotationCount];
00372             }
00373             else if ( opCode == kNXTGetInputValues )
00374             {
00375                 UInt8  port;
00376                 UInt8  valid;
00377                 UInt8  isCalibrated;
00378                 UInt8  sensorType;
00379                 SInt8  sensorMode;
00380                 UInt16 rawValue;
00381                 UInt16 normalizedValue;
00382                 SInt16 scaledValue;
00383                 SInt16 calibratedValue;
00384                 
00385                 memcpy(&port,               dataPointer+i+0,  1); // 3
00386                 memcpy(&valid,              dataPointer+i+1,  1); // 4
00387                 memcpy(&isCalibrated,       dataPointer+i+2,  1); // 5
00388                 memcpy(&sensorType,         dataPointer+i+3,  1); // 6
00389                 memcpy(&sensorMode,         dataPointer+i+4,  1); // 7
00390                 memcpy(&rawValue,           dataPointer+i+5,  2); // 8
00391                 memcpy(&normalizedValue,    dataPointer+i+7,  2); // 10
00392                 memcpy(&scaledValue,        dataPointer+i+9,  2); // 12
00393                 memcpy(&calibratedValue,    dataPointer+i+11, 2); // 14
00394                 i += 12;
00395                 
00396                 rawValue        = OSSwapLittleToHostInt16(rawValue);
00397                 normalizedValue = OSSwapLittleToHostInt16(normalizedValue);
00398                 scaledValue     = OSSwapLittleToHostInt16(scaledValue);
00399                 calibratedValue = OSSwapLittleToHostInt16(calibratedValue);
00400                 
00401                 if ( valid && [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTGetInputValues:port:isCalibrated:type:mode:rawValue:normalizedValue:scaledValue:calibratedValue:)] )
00402                     [_delegate NXTGetInputValues:self
00403                                                                                         port:port
00404                                                                         isCalibrated:isCalibrated
00405                                                                                         type:sensorType
00406                                                                                         mode:sensorMode
00407                                                                                 rawValue:rawValue
00408                                                                  normalizedValue:normalizedValue
00409                                                                          scaledValue:scaledValue
00410                                                                  calibratedValue:scaledValue];
00411             }
00412             else if ( opCode == kNXTGetBatteryLevel )
00413             {
00414                 UInt16 batteryLevel;
00415                 
00416                 memcpy(&batteryLevel, dataPointer+i+0, 2); // 3
00417                 i += 2;
00418                 
00419                 batteryLevel = OSSwapLittleToHostInt16(batteryLevel);
00420                 
00421                 if ( [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTBatteryLevel:batteryLevel:)] )
00422                     [_delegate NXTBatteryLevel:self batteryLevel:batteryLevel];
00423             }
00424             else if ( opCode == kNXTKeepAlive )
00425             {
00426                 UInt32 sleepTime;
00427                 
00428                 memcpy(&sleepTime, dataPointer+i+0, 4); // 3
00429                 i += 4;
00430                 
00431                 sleepTime = OSSwapLittleToHostInt32(sleepTime);
00432                 
00433                 if ( [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTSleepTime:sleepTime:)] )
00434                     [_delegate NXTSleepTime:self sleepTime:sleepTime];
00435             }
00436                         
00437                         // LSGetStatus often returns the kNXTPendingCommunication error status
00438             else if ( opCode == kNXTLSGetStatus )
00439             {
00440                 UInt8 bytesReady;
00441                 
00442                 memcpy(&bytesReady, dataPointer+i+0, 1); // 3
00443                 i += 1;
00444                 if ( [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTLSGetStatus:port:bytesReady:)] )
00445                     [_delegate NXTLSGetStatus:self port:[self popLsGetStatusQueue] bytesReady:bytesReady];
00446             }
00447             else if ( opCode == kNXTLSRead )
00448             {
00449                 UInt8 bytesRead;
00450                 NSData *data;
00451                 
00452                 memcpy(&bytesRead, dataPointer+i+0, 1); // 3
00453                 
00454                 data = [[NSData dataWithBytes:(dataPointer+i+1) length:16] retain];
00455                 i += 17;
00456                                 
00457                 if ( [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTLSRead:port:bytesRead:data:)] )
00458                     [_delegate NXTLSRead:self port:[self popLsReadQueue] bytesRead:bytesRead data:data];
00459             }
00460             else if ( opCode == kNXTGetCurrentProgramName )
00461             {
00462                 NSString *currentProgramName = [[NSString stringWithCString:(dataPointer+i) encoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding] retain]; // 3-22
00463                 i += 20;
00464                                 
00465                 if ( [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTCurrentProgramName:currentProgramName:)] )
00466                     [_delegate NXTCurrentProgramName:self currentProgramName:currentProgramName];
00467             }
00468             else if ( opCode == kNXTMessageRead )
00469             {
00470                 UInt8 localInbox;
00471                 UInt8 messageSize;
00472                 NSData *message;
00473                 
00474                 memcpy(&localInbox, dataPointer+i+0, 1); // 3
00475                 memcpy(&messageSize, dataPointer+i+1, 1); // 4
00476                 message = [NSData dataWithBytes:dataPointer+i+2 length:messageSize-1];
00477                 i += 61;
00478                 
00479                 if ( [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(NXTMessageRead:message:localInbox:)] )
00480                     [_delegate NXTMessageRead:self message:message localInbox:localInbox];
00481             }
00482         }
00483     }
00484 }

00496 - (void)startProgram:(NSString*)program
00497 {
00498     char message[22] = {
00499         [self doReturn],
00500         kNXTStartProgram
00501     };
00502     
00503     [program getCString:(message+2) maxLength:20 encoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding];
00504     message[21] = '\0';
00505     
00506     // send the message
00507     [self sendMessage:message length:22];
00508 }

00534 - (void)playSoundFile:(NSString*)soundfile loop:(BOOL)loop
00535 {
00536     char message[23] = {
00537         [self doReturn],
00538         kNXTPlaySoundFile,
00539         (loop ? 1 : 0)
00540     };

00543         
00544     // send the message

00546 }

00548 - (void)playTone:(UInt16)tone duration:(UInt16)duration
00549 {
00550     // construct the message
00551     char message[] = {
00552         [self doReturn],
00553         kNXTPlayTone,
00554         (tone & 0x00ff),
00555         (tone & 0xff00) >> 8,
00556         (duration & 0x00ff),
00557         (duration & 0xff00) >> 8
00558     };
00559     
00560     // send the message
00561     [self sendMessage:message length:6];
00562 }

00576 - (void)setOutputState:(UInt8)port
00577                  power:(SInt8)power
00578                   mode:(UInt8)mode
00579         regulationMode:(UInt8)regulationMode
00580              turnRatio:(SInt8)turnRatio
00581               runState:(UInt8)runState
00582             tachoLimit:(UInt32)tachoLimit
00583 {
00584     NXT_ASSERT_MOTOR_PORT(port);
00585     
00586     // construct the message
00587     char message[] = {
00588         [self doReturn],
00589         kNXTSetOutputState,
00590         port,
00591         power,
00592         mode,
00593         regulationMode,
00594         turnRatio,
00595         runState,
00596         (tachoLimit & 0x000000ff),
00597         (tachoLimit & 0x0000ff00) >> 8,
00598         (tachoLimit & 0x00ff0000) >> 16,
00599         (tachoLimit & 0xff000000) >> 24
00600     };
00601     
00602     // send the message
00603     [self sendMessage:message length:12];
00604 }

00667 - (void)messageWrite:(UInt8)inbox message:(void*)message size:(int)size
00668 {
00669     char _message[size+4];
00670     
00671     _message[0] = [self doReturn];
00672     _message[1] = kNXTMessageWrite;
00673     _message[2] = inbox;
00674     _message[3] = size;
00675     
00676     memcpy(_message+4, message, size);
00677     
00678     [self sendMessage:_message length:size+4];
00679 }

00722 - (void)LSGetStatus:(UInt8)port
00723 {
00724     NXT_ASSERT_SENSOR_PORT(port);
00725     
00726     char message[] = {
00727         kNXTRet,
00728         kNXTLSGetStatus,
00729         port
00730     };
00731     
00732     // send the message
00733     [self sendMessage:message length:3];
00734 }
00735 
00736 - (void)LSWrite:(UInt8)port txLength:(UInt8)txLength rxLength:(UInt8)rxLength txData:(void*)txData
00737 {
00738     NXT_ASSERT_SENSOR_PORT(port);
00739     char message[5+txLength];
00740     
00741     message[0] = kNXTRet;
00742     message[1] = kNXTLSWrite;
00743     message[2] = port;
00744     message[3] = txLength;
00745     message[4] = rxLength;
00746     
00747     memcpy(message+5, txData, txLength);
00748     
00749     [self sendMessage:message length:(5+txLength)];
00750 }
00751 
00752 - (void)LSRead:(UInt8)port
00753 {
00754     NXT_ASSERT_SENSOR_PORT(port);
00755     
00756     char message[] = {
00757         kNXTRet,
00758         kNXTLSRead,
00759         port
00760     };
00761     
00762     [self pushLsReadQueue:port];
00763     [self sendMessage:message length:3];
00764 }

00774 
00775 - (void)keepAlive
00776 {
00777     char message[] = {
00778         [self doReturn],
00779         kNXTKeepAlive
00780     };
00781     
00782     // send the message
00783     [self sendMessage:message length:2];
00784 }
00785 
00786 - (void)setupTouchSensor:(UInt8)port
00787 {
00788     [self setInputMode:port type:kNXTSwitch mode:kNXTBooleanMode];
00789 }
00790 
00791 - (void)setupSoundSensor:(UInt8)port adjusted:(BOOL)adjusted
00792 {
00793     if ( adjusted )
00794         [self setInputMode:port type:kNXTSoundDBA mode:kNXTPCTFullScaleMode];
00795     else
00796         [self setInputMode:port type:kNXTSoundDB mode:kNXTPCTFullScaleMode];
00797 }
00798 
00799 - (void)setupLightSensor:(UInt8)port active:(BOOL)active
00800 {
00801     if ( active )
00802         [self setInputMode:port type:kNXTLightActive mode:kNXTPCTFullScaleMode];
00803     else
00804         [self setInputMode:port type:kNXTLightInactive mode:kNXTPCTFullScaleMode];
00805 }
00806 
00807 - (void)setupUltrasoundSensor:(UInt8)port continuous:(BOOL)continuous
00808 {
00809     char message[] = { 0x02, 0x41, 0x02 };
00810     [self setInputMode:port type:kNXTLowSpeed9V mode:kNXTRawMode];
00811     usleep(1000000);
00812     [self LSWrite:port txLength:3 rxLength:0 txData:message];
00813 }
00814 
00815 - (void)getUltrasoundByte:(UInt8)port byte:(UInt8)byte
00816 {
00817     if ( byte > 7 )
00818         return;
00819     char message[] = { 0x02, 0x42+byte };
00820     [self pushLsGetStatusQueue:port];
00821     [self LSWrite:port txLength:2 rxLength:1 txData:message];
00822 }
00823 
00824 - (void)pollSensor:(UInt8)port interval:(NSTimeInterval)seconds
00825 {
00826     NXT_ASSERT_SENSOR_PORT(port);
00827     [self invalidateSensorTimer:port];
00828     
00829     if ( seconds > 0 )
00830     {
00831         NSLog(@"pollSensor: starting poll timer");
00832         sensorTimers[port] = [[NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:seconds
00833                                                                target:self
00834                                                              selector:@selector(doSensorPoll:)
00835                                                              userInfo:[NSData dataWithBytes:&port length:1]
00836                                                               repeats:YES] retain];
00837     }
00838 }
00839 
00840 - (void)pollUltrasoundSensor:(UInt8)port interval:(NSTimeInterval)seconds
00841 {
00842     NXT_ASSERT_SENSOR_PORT(port);
00843     [self invalidateSensorTimer:port]; 
00844     
00845     if ( seconds > 0 )
00846         sensorTimers[port] = [[NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:seconds
00847                                                                target:self
00848                                                              selector:@selector(doUltrasoundPoll:)
00849                                                              userInfo:[NSData dataWithBytes:&port length:1]
00850                                                               repeats:YES] retain];
00851 }
00852 
00853 - (void)pollKeepAlive
00854 {
00855     if ( keepAliveTimer == nil )
00856         keepAliveTimer = [[NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:60
00857                                                            target:self
00858                                                          selector:@selector(doKeepAlivePoll:)
00859                                                          userInfo:nil
00860                                                           repeats:YES] retain];
00861 }
00862 
00863 - (void)pollBatteryLevel:(NSTimeInterval)seconds
00864 {
00865     if ( batteryLevelTimer != nil )
00866     {
00867         [batteryLevelTimer invalidate];
00868         batteryLevelTimer = nil;
00869     }
00870     
00871     if ( seconds > 0 )
00872         batteryLevelTimer = [[NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:seconds
00873                                                               target:self
00874                                                             selector:@selector(doBatteryPoll:)
00875                                                             userInfo:nil
00876                                                              repeats:YES] retain];
00877 }
00878 
00879 - (void)pollServo:(UInt8)port interval:(NSTimeInterval)seconds
00880 {
00881     NXT_ASSERT_MOTOR_PORT(port);
00882     
00883     if ( motorTimers[port] != nil )
00884     {
00885         [motorTimers[port] invalidate];
00886         motorTimers[port] = nil;
00887     }
00888     
00889     if ( seconds > 0 )
00890         motorTimers[port] = [[NSTimer scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval:seconds
00891                                                               target:self
00892                                                             selector:@selector(doServoPoll:)
00893                                                             userInfo:[NSData dataWithBytes:&port length:1]
00894                                                              repeats:YES] retain];
00895 }
00896 
00897 - (void)stopAllTimers
00898 {
00899     int i;
00900     
00901     for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
00902         [self pollSensor:i interval:0];
00903     for ( i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00904         [self pollServo:i interval:0];
00905     
00906     if ( keepAliveTimer != nil )
00907     {
00908         [keepAliveTimer invalidate];
00909         keepAliveTimer = nil;
00910     }
00911     
00912     [self pollBatteryLevel:0];
00913 }
00914 
00915 - (void)moveServo:(UInt8)port power:(SInt8)power tacholimit:(UInt32)tacholimit
00916 {
00917     NXT_ASSERT_MOTOR_PORT(port);
00918     
00919     [self setOutputState:port
00920                    power:power
00921                     mode:(kNXTMotorOn | kNXTRegulated)
00922           regulationMode:kNXTRegulationModeMotorSpeed
00923                turnRatio:0
00924                 runState:kNXTMotorRunStateRunning
00925               tachoLimit:tacholimit];
00926 }
00927 
00928 
00929 
00930 
00931 
00932 - (void)stopServos
00933 {
00934     [self setOutputState:kNXTMotorAll
00935                    power:0
00936                     mode:0
00937           regulationMode:kNXTRegulationModeIdle
00938                turnRatio:0
00939                 runState:kNXTMotorRunStateIdle
00940               tachoLimit:0];
00941 }

00947     return connected;
